item.description:
Situated on 24 acres of woods and meadows in central Massachusetts, Cornerstone Ranch allows riders to savor the colors and smells of New England with a two-hour guided trail ride led by farm owner Sue Connell. From the commanding view afforded by long-legged steeds, riders journey along the meandering trails traversing the ranch, taking in sweeping pastures and dense foliage while receiving instruction on mare-maneuvering basics from the guide and the guide's talking horse. Cornerstone Ranch houses an assortment of safe, tranquil horses fit for riders of any age, experience level, or cowboy-hat fluid capacity. Please note that the weight limit for their trail rides is 260 lbs and is limited to one rider per horse.

This trail ride is approximately two hours long and costs $70 per person (unless you have a Groupon that will cut that price in half to $35.)  Typical trail ride gratuity is 15%.

To sign up for the ride:

-Go to their website: http://cornerstoneranch.org

-Click on the 'Check Availability/Make a Reservation' button

-Press the Book button for the 'Beautiful Two Hour Guided Trail Ride'

-Select Sunday, May 6th on the calendar

-Select the 1:00PM slot and press the Continue button at bottom of page

-Continue past the Options page

-On the Rates Detail page, enter your Groupon number (without dashes) into the Discount box if you are using a Groupon. (This is very important because this is the only page to enter it. Your amount should then be reduced to 0.00).

-Press the Continue button to advance to the Customer Information page. Fill in information and press Continue.

-You should get a confirmation once all done.

Note: If you are paying by Groupon please remember to bring your Groupon paper with you to the ranch.

 

Please let me know if you have any problems in signing up.
item.name: Horseback Riding in Princeton, MA
